title: Wear Calendar
summary: Calendar for android wear where you can check your everyday events.
description: With Wear Calendar you can review the events of each day, just by selecting from the month view.In the month view, Wear Calendar will highlight the days when you have events and from the phone settings.  You can decide if it  will be highlighted days with all day events, or just the days that have events with start and end time defined.To switch between months, just slide your finger up and down.To view events for a particular day, just tap it from the month view.
descriptionHTML:
With Wear Calendar you can review the events of each day, just by selecting from the month view.

In the month view, Wear Calendar will highlight the days when you have events and from the phone settings. You can decide if it will be highlighted days with all day events, or just the days that have events with start and end time defined.

To switch between months, just slide your finger up and down.
To view events for a particular day, just tap it from the month view.
comments: Why offer it for free and won't let people use it without paying. Lame!
Can't see the whole program Other views cannot be seen without having to pay for it. Best to look at others
